name: Trump Hellscapes
description:
This 3D experience aims to delve into the collective anxieties caused by the increasingly concerning actions of the US President, Donald Trump. The last year and a half has often felt like a bad fever dream you couldn’t wake yourself up from, so I wanted to get across these feelings in an interactive format whilst providing a commentary on the 24-hour news cycle and how with Trump there is never a break in insane news. Primarily though I wanted to highlight the thing that causes the most anxiety, America always thought of as the great leader of the Western world is now the home of one of the most morally ambiguous leaders in the World.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W A S D - Strafing

Space - Jump

Use mouse/trackpad to control camera direction

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Warning: Contains some graphic content
